item.title: Berita Harian’s Achiever of The Year 2022 Awards Honour Exemplary Malay-Muslim Achievers
item.description: Berita Harian has named Associate Professor Hadijah Rahmat as Berita Harian’s Achiever of the Year (Anugerah Jauhari Berita Harian), and Mr Lee Syafiq Muhd Ridzuan Lee as Berita Harian’s Young Achiever of the Year (Anugerah Jauhari Harapan Berita Harian) in its 24th edition of the annual awards to honour the contributions of outstanding individuals in our Malay/Muslim community. […]

item.title: Lianhe Zaobao Explores Ai-enabled Digitalisation Collaborations With Sensetime
item.description: Singapore, 31 October 2022 – Lianhe Zaobao (ZB), the flagship Chinese-language daily of SPH Media, and SenseTime International (SenseTime) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) today to explore digitalisation collaborations. The MOU was signed between Ms Loh Woon Yen, Managing Editor, Chinese Media Group, SPH Media and Ms Lien Hui Luen, Director of Strategic Partnerships, SenseTime […]

item.title: Her World’s Woman of the Year and Young Woman Achiever of the Year push the boundaries of education
item.description: Since 1991, the Her World Woman of the Year Award has recognised and celebrated outstanding women in Singapore, and it has become one of the most established and recognisable awards here with a distinguished list of winners

item.title: Eight Teachers Honoured for Their Exemplary Efforts in Teaching the Chinese Language
item.description: Eight Chinese language teachers were presented with the Distinguished Chinese Language Teachers Award during a presentation ceremony held on 24 September 2022 at the News Centre Auditorium. The annual Award, in its 25th edition this year, recognises deserving Chinese language teachers who have shown exemplary efforts towards the teaching of the Chinese language and culture. […]

item.title: Singapore Food Masters 2022 Brings You the War of the Woks
item.description: Singapore, 23 September 2022 - 12 outstanding eateries will be spotlighted and celebrated for the delicious food that they have been providing in the Singapore Food Masters. The annual event is back for its sixth edition and from today till 22 October, our readers are invited to vote for the eatery they deem most worthy to […]

item.title: Mr Wee Ee Cheong and Mr Lee Chee Koon among outstanding local business leaders honoured at the 37th Singapore Business Awards
item.description: Continuing its annual tradition of celebrating the best in business, the Singapore Business Awards (SBA) named Mr Wee Ee Cheong, Deputy Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB), as the Businessman Of The Year, while Mr Lee Chee Koon, Group CEO of CapitaLand Investment Limited, received the honour of Outstanding Chief […]

item.title: MENDAKI and SPH Media signed a Memorandum of Understanding to develop a one-stop educational resource microsite for the Malay/Muslim community
item.description: Singapore, 30 August 2022 - Yayasan MENDAKI (MENDAKI) and SPH Media signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) today to develop a one-stop educational resource microsite for young parents and students in the Malay/Muslim community. The MOU was signed between Mdm Zuraidah Abdullah, Chief Executive Officer, MENDAKI and Mr Saat A. Rahman, Editor, Berita Harian. The MOU […]

item.title: Joint SPH Media and SPH Foundation Scholarship Awards Ceremony – Cultivating and growing talents for our newsroom
item.description: To produce quality journalism, SPH Media continues to attract talents through the award of scholarships and internships for local undergraduates. This year, the following scholarships are being awarded at the Joint SPH Media and SPH Foundation Scholarship Awards Ceremony on 25 August 2022. 12 SPH Media Journalism Scholarships 14 SPH Media Scholarships for Children of […]
